column1: Families are a sacred part of American society & have served an increasingly important role amid the COVID-19 pandemic.  I will always stand with families in Georgia & across the country & have worked in the Senate to uphold that commitment by introducing four pro-family bills. https://t.co/tYSneOJSsl

Outstanding news this morning: A second COVID-19 vaccine has shown to be more than 90% effective.   Another prime example of the big results coming from the public-private partnerships formed under #OperationWarpSpeed and @realDonaldTrump’s administration! https://t.co/yIM90LqyKn

We want to do everything in our power to help those who are struggling due to #COVID. It is our top priority to provide those in need with the unemployment benefits they were promised.  Here’s how Team Loeffler was able to help Faye in Dekalb receive her unemployment benefits. https://t.co/UN4dDXnIsJ

Small businesses are job creators and the engine of our economy. As a conservative businesswoman I'm working to help keep Main Street open and deliver results for Georgians.   Here’s how Team Loeffler was able to help Dawn from Cherokee County secure a PPP loan amid #COVID. https://t.co/OYB16SCXsV

A big congratulations to @GA_DOI Commissioner King in earning the Defense Meritorious Service Medal for his role in the @NationalGuard's #COVID19 efforts.  His work elevated Georgia's pandemic relief response & I couldn’t be more proud of his dedication. https://t.co/MloYjlozxb
Extending my heartfelt prayers to @POTUS @FLOTUS and the entire First Family.   May God continue to comfort and heal as they recover from COVID-19. https://t.co/nYnO5M54iq

When it comes to #COVID19 China has…   ✔️ Lied ✔️ Denied ✔️ Covered up   No more.   I'm not going to let the CCP's continued deception go unchecked. Read more on the legislation & other actions I'm taking to hold China accountable in @FoxBusiness ↓  https://t.co/oWl963dsEg

This #MadeInAmerica Week we must remember the critical need to bring manufacturing home.   COVID has exposed our reliance on China & revealed vulnerabilities in our supply chain.  I intro'd the BEAT CHINA Act to incentivize change and defend the USA against the CCP. #BuyAmerican https://t.co/quBPFlIomW

.@realdonaldtrump and Republicans in Congress have NEVER stopped working for the American people.  From COVID relief to confirming Amy Coney Barrett Democrats need to stop playing politics and put our country first.  Republicans will continue to move forward and do our jobs. https://t.co/cC4MJK6GJH

We must continue to take precautions to protect ourselves & others from COVID.  But to be clear—China is to blame for this global pandemic & needs to be held accountable.  I’ll continue to work in the Senate to ensure the CCP faces severe consequences for its COVID deception. https://t.co/SIkejxrEvC

.@realDonaldTrump & @FLOTUS COVID diagnoses are a stark reminder of who the true bad actor is in this situation: China.  Because of China’s deception the virus has wreaked havoc in the United States & across the globe.   The Chinese Communist Party must be held accountable.

Like so many in our country and around the world I’m lifting @realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS up in prayer as they recover from #COVID19.  I know their steadfast leadership through this pandemic will continue just the same.   America is with you 100%! https://t.co/XrYISX7RYw

GREAT news: 200000 #COVID19 rapid point-of-care tests are coming to Georgia thanks to @realDonaldTrump & his admin.   This critical testing expansion will be extremely beneficial to GA in our fight against the invisible enemy.   Thank you for your excellent leadership @POTUS! https://t.co/bua0EU6IO6

Access to telehealth is more critical than ever — for veterans farmers families & beyond.  Like @realDonaldTrump I'm fighting to ensure Georgians have access to the mental & physical telehealth resources they need to stay healthy & safe during COVID. https://t.co/aYLvmhlZmA https://t.co/6fhOXRk45m

At today's @GOPHELP hearing on America's COVID response I asked @CDCDirector about what we can do at the federal level to bring more awareness to the importance of mental health.  More than ever we must ensure Americans have the needed resources to preserve their mental health. https://t.co/YUTCzP3NKw

Small businesses are the backbone of our economy & they deserve support now more than ever.  As we recover from COVID let’s use this year’s #SmallBusinessWeek as an opportunity to celebrate the resolve & ingenuity of American #smallbiz.  We must always support #smallbiz. https://t.co/cN3axmR7UQ

COVID relief BLOCKED by Democrats. Again.   It’s time for Democrats - who are doing nothing more than sitting on their heels and getting haircuts - to stop politicizing the coronavirus and start prioritizing the American people. https://t.co/Es5IaqAJER

ATTN GA farmers & cattlemen: Be sure to apply for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program before this Friday Sept. 11.  These folks — who feed & clothe America & the world — need all the help they can get to make it through COVID. Don't miss out on this valuable resource. 👇🏻 https://t.co/NCju4O4tfi

I'm proud to have helped deliver over $39 BILLION in COVID relief for the Peach State to ensure ALL Georgians get the help they need - & I'm not done yet.   Read more about the growing list of actions I've taken for GA in the Senate during this pandemic: https://t.co/CIJcwYu5UB

Good work by @TheJusticeDept.   Back in June I asked @HHSGov Secretary Azar and @SeemaCMS to examine misguided policies in certain states that hampered the response to the coronavirus outbreak & put America’s senior citizens at risk.  More: https://t.co/1rIkYf7uzk https://t.co/KsEK4Sin5z

GA NEWS: The Port of Savannah is the top port for U.S. exports in the first 5 months of 2020.   Thank you @GovKemp @GaPorts for your leadership in positioning our great state as a resilient & powerful economic leader in trade & beyond even amid COVID. https://t.co/qJEFs9hdn8

Happy to offer testimony in a @USTradeRep virtual hearing that I pushed to have rescheduled after it was postponed due to COVID.     As a member of @SenateAgGOP I want to protect GA farmers from produce dumping & price distortion so they can compete on an equal playing field.

Small & minority-owned businesses which were already struggling due to COVID have been devastated by rioters & looters.   The Securing Commerce & Protecting Businesses Act would make destroying or looting businesses during a riot a federal crime.   We have to protect #smallbiz. https://t.co/O30fZg79Ax https://t.co/7I1AsBKpBd

My visit to @GACyberCenter with @GAFirstLady focused on a crucial resource particularly amid COVID: Telehealth.   Proud to fight for access to telehealth at the federal level & appreciate the work @AUG_University is doing to improve virtual care efforts in GA and beyond. https://t.co/pH1T0zbMSm

NEWS: GA communities are receiving $4.1M in CARES Act grants.  This funding will support the Peach State during these uncertain times by helping #smallbiz & cities recover from COVID & grow their local economies in the long term.  Thanks @CommerceGov! https://t.co/qLcergKJ3t

Last week @SenateVA advanced two bills I've championed that aim to improve vets' health care and access to telehealth.   I'm a strong supporter of our veterans and I'm committed to ensuring their health and safety amid COVID-19 and beyond.   More⬇️⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/m8QRZGt6ZD
If you’ve recovered from COVID-19 I encourage you to consider donating plasma to help your fellow Americans.   We're all in this together! https://t.co/0iioE2MD0s

Georgia is a top producer of blueberries in the nation which is why I was proud to support this resolution.   As a member of @SenateAgGOP I have fought for blueberry farmers since day one and will continue to defend all farmers amid COVID and beyond.    https://t.co/yDzDCRwdPi https://t.co/xMcdt6dSaL

The CARES Act continues to provide targeted relief to help #smallbiz recover from COVID. This week small businesses in Atlanta & Coastal GA received $11.8M in grants.  We're putting this money to good use to help all of us come back stronger than before. https://t.co/nOU84u1W7L

Had a productive roundtable in GA yesterday with @SeemaCMS & health care stakeholders to learn what's needed on the ground to protect vulnerable populations amid COVID.  At a time when we as a nation are facing enormous challenges I am committed to helping Georgians fight COVID. https://t.co/EiPHHeEpLL

Welcomed @SeemaCMS to ATL today for a roundtable with GA health care stakeholders to discuss the effects of COVID-19 on minority & at-risk communities & how we at the federal level can collaborate to keep vulnerable Georgians safe & assist them in recovery.   Thanks @SeemaCMS! https://t.co/NbJBZH6Loe

The Chinese Communist Party’s deception knows no bounds.   - Misled the world on COVID-19 - Attempted to steal U.S. vaccine research - Burned documents after State Dept. shut down their consulate for IP theft & spying   Enough. Glad @StateDept is holding China accountable. https://t.co/43F7sowcio

Good news for the millions of Americans who lost their health insurance during COVID-19.   I introduced the Affordable Health Care Options Act to prevent future restrictions on these plans that give Americans an affordable health insurance option.   https://t.co/o2a3PvgQiF

.@AUG_University has played an integral role in our battle against COVID-19 & I couldn't be more proud of the work they've done.  Instead of belittling & politicizing their hard work & successes Mayor Bottoms should work with @GovKemp to find solutions. https://t.co/JGyDYF5sTI

Since I was sworn in to the U.S. Senate I’ve worked tirelessly to defend Georgia families farmers #smallbiz front-line workers law enforcement and everyone in between.   Through COVID-19 & beyond the well-being of Georgians will continue to be my number one priority. https://t.co/1fDSIsJAAg

Great call with the folks of @NCottonCouncil & the National Council of Textile Organizations to discuss the current state of the cotton & textile sector & the future of COVID-19 aid.  As a member of @SenateAgGOP I'm committed to fighting for GA farmers during & beyond COVID-19.

GA farmers are getting a boost in COVID-19 aid with the expansion of the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program thanks to @USDA.   The expansion will broaden the applicant pool so that more Georgia farmers can get the help they need. More: https://t.co/zvZh2hmrWT

More than ever Americans need affordable individualized commonsense health care solutions amid COVID-19. I introduced the Affordable Health Care Options Act as part of Families in the USA to do just that.   What they're saying about USA RISE: https://t.co/LidTeqapiH

Great news for GA farmers: @USDA is expanding the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program (CFAP) to better support GA's expansive agriculture industry and the hardworking Georgians who support it amid COVID-19.  Thank you @POTUS & @SecretarySonny!  Read more: https://t.co/5cwmaNjxkX

American families needed innovative legislative solutions to weather #COVID19 which is why I introduced the Working Families Childcare Access Act - part of Families in the USA - to give more financial flexibility to parents.   What @approject is saying about USA RISE: https://t.co/pk9PBvYp7N

Nonprofits like @GeorgiaAquarium have faced uncertainty when it came to paying employees during #COVID19. Through the LIFE Now Act - part of Families in the USA - more organizations can get the relief they need through the #PPP.   What they're saying about USA RISE: https://t.co/niUt8QrAAy

#SmallBiz employs roughly 1.7M Georgians & has been among the hardest hit by COVID-19. This CARES Act $ will help GA #smallbiz keep employees on payroll & not only survive these difficult times but emerge stronger. Thank you @POTUS & @CommerceGov! https://t.co/74ZuPG3Iyj

Congress & @realDonaldTrump have passed a historic amount of aid in response to COVID-19 for #smallbiz. As we begin to look at what additional stimulus may look like the first step is to ensure the remaining $130B #PPP funding is fully deployed.   More with @GwinnettDaily: https://t.co/TwlRyMdLKT

Another example of how Congress & @realDonaldTrump are working to help farmers & families in need during #COVID19.   Read more on how @POTUS & @SenateAgGOP are focused on helping rural America recover from this pandemic in my op-ed with @SenPatRoberts: https://t.co/7UoqTEDUhO https://t.co/gbCA4sLlkh
Grateful to @GovKemp @GaDPH & Dr. Toomey for leading Georgia through the COVID-19 pandemic.   Be smart and do your part to #slowthespread. Mask up Georgia! https://t.co/gxWk6hWnox

As we heard from @SteveFDA in today’s @GOPHELP hearing having an independent supply chain is paramount to moving forward from COVID-19.    We must ensure what happened during this pandemic - America at the mercy of China for things like PPE - never happens again. https://t.co/Ut5uJKCPiQ

Highlight from today’s @GOPHELP hearing:   Under the leadership of @RealDonaldTrump @CDCgov is working to develop a strong & safe approach to handling COVID-19 & the flu at the same time this Fall.   How can you make a difference? Make sure you & your family get a flu shot. https://t.co/dpzfwgNgQY

Because of COVID-19 internet has become all the more critical as work school health care & leisure moved online for many of us.  This $12.5M grant will help Georgians get online grow their business learn & connect with loved ones. Thank you @USDA! https://t.co/gupcssb8JV

COVID-19 recovery needs to be a job-led recovery.  We need to deploy the trillions of dollars passed in the CARES packages to get Americans back to work safely.   Reigniting our economy starts with job creation. https://t.co/XjcEpLaXOG

Thousands of American families are mourning loved ones who lost their lives due to COVID-19 in nursing homes.   I’ve asked @HHSGov & @CMSGov to examine which state policies put seniors at risk & take the steps to correct them. https://t.co/8MCkqjGkWv

Pandemic takeaways:   1. China must be held accountable for mishandling COVID-19  2. America can no longer be dependent on China for critical products like PPE and pharmaceuticals   The BEAT China Act addresses both by incentivizing companies to produce on U.S. soil not Chinese. https://t.co/gVT1zZOtJq

Proud to join @SenRickScott in support of American-made products.   COVID-19 exposed the dangers of relying on production of critical products made overseas. We must work to incentivize companies to make products in this country & encourage Americans to #BuyAmerican. https://t.co/66AY7SQJ3g

I joined my colleagues in urging Congress to consider additional COVID-19 relief for HBCUs.   As we consider possible additional stimulus aid we must pay close attention to the needs of our nation’s HBCUs & Minority Serving Institutions. https://t.co/CE4O0ba5VO

Spoke with dozens of local leaders today through @GACounty about Congress’ efforts to combat the health & economic impact of COVID-19.  Helping GA families & communities has been a key focus of mine throughout this pandemic & it will continue to be during our recovery & beyond. https://t.co/FTTPLtjvuS

COVID-19 shed light on our supply chain vulnerabilities which is why I intro'd legislation to create a @USDA supply chain administrator to ensure the govt. works w/ farmers food banks & distributors to make our supply chain more efficient going forward. https://t.co/01VbIbU9pt

As I’ve heard from GA business owners like Jessica #PPP has provided a much-needed lifeline for #smallbiz struggling due to #COVID19.   #PPP is working and has helped:   ➡️ American #smallbiz ➡️ #Smallbiz employees ➡️ and those employees' families. https://t.co/cEDPWwLC8O

Great morning speaking with @gacities leaders to discuss issues important to our #GA communities.   Getting through the coronavirus pandemic isn’t just a big city issue; it’s an every city issue and I appreciate hearing from folks back home as we work to overcome challenges. https://t.co/pHZLIMiQCw

Thanks to @LockheedMartin GA will continue progressing in #COVID19 testing. The company has granted $450000 to @GradyHealth to increase COVID-19 testing capacity & reach. This is great news for the entire state as we continue safely reopening and recovering from this pandemic.

Our country is facing historic economic challenges as a result of COVID-19.   But as last month’s jobs # showed we’re moving in the right direction. My USA RISE Plan will get barriers out of the way to spur job creation and a return to the greatest economy we've seen in decades. https://t.co/UFcDS2vLCd

A critical component of economic recovery following COVID-19 is getting Americans back to work.   That's why I've crafted legislation as part of my USA RISE Plan focused on incentivizing #smallbiz to rehire employees invest in growth & break through red tape to spur recovery...

With my USA RISE Plan as a framework I’m working on legislation to help our economy recover from COVID-19.   One step to recovery? Getting the federal government out of main street’s way so small businesses can create more jobs and Americans can get back to work. https://t.co/PCC4Sn8K7N

As we work to respond to COVID-19 we need to offer commonsense solutions to problems facing Americans such as loss of health insurance by way of job loss.   That’s why I’ve introduced legislation to make access to short-term health plans permanent. Read: https://t.co/ZXwpUYqWtP

Great news: “@AtlantaRegional has allocated $1.9M in federal relief funds to expand meal delivery services for older adults in 10 metro counties.”   This money will help 1500 GA seniors get the food they need amid COVID-19. https://t.co/7NrwjLaDV3

Georgia businesses and leading pro-family conservative & community organizations have weighed in on how my USA RISE Plan will help hardworking families weather the coronavirus pandemic.    Here’s what they’re saying here: https://t.co/EN9kDFoAA5

As we work to respond to this pandemic I encourage everyone to do their part to help their fellow American.   If you’ve recovered from #COVID19 you may have antibodies that could be used as a treatment. See if you can help others by donating plasma at https://t.co/dISO5r5yv5.

Thank you to the Mars Wrigley Foundation for its donation of $25000 to assist Gainesville-based Georgia Mountain Food Bank in its efforts to feed the community during this time.   Proud to see @MarsGlobal stepping up to support communities during COVID-19!

As we enter a new phase of our COVID-19 response strengthening testing capabilities remains a top priority.   The Right to Test Act will empower states to expand their diagnostic capacity without needless delay & bolster flexibility to provide tests for those who need them.

Gig workers play an increasingly critical role in our economy especially during COVID-19.   We must reduce barriers preventing these Americans from receiving protective equipment & other resources that will keep them safe as they work. https://t.co/Sf7g95ZO8N

Thanks to the good work of @GovKemp in partnership with @CVSHealth 23 new COVID-19 testing sites are opening today across GA.  These new sites will utilize self-swab tests to help mitigate the spread of the virus as we work to recover from this pandemic. Thank you @GovKemp! https://t.co/8P9hv3QQkH

This year’s Emergency Medical Services Week strikes a different chord as EMS workers in the Peach State and across the country work tirelessly to keep all of us safe and healthy amid COVID-19. Thank you to our amazing EMS workers! https://t.co/x4CNHExgtq

As we begin to look forward we must support job growth & families which will allow parents to get back to work & reduce the fallout from COVID-19.   Through Families in the USA a pillar of my USA RISE Plan I'm working to do just that. https://t.co/pI3tuJ6UW8

PPP was created to keep #smallbiz afloat & keep workers on payroll amid COVID-19 not to provide funding for abortions. These groups should immediately return the $80M & the SBA should investigate how this happened.   Abortion providers shouldn't get a dime of this lifeline. https://t.co/RHitU0kzne

Families in the USA - a pillar of my USA RISE Plan a framework for U.S. economic recovery.   As we move forward from this pandemic we must rally behind America’s families and the organizations that support them. By supporting families we will all rise above #COVID19. https://t.co/N3ZyKj7IkR

UPDATE: GA state & local govts received $5.8B in fed #COVID19 funding to combat & recover from this pandemic. I'm glad our state has received this much-needed support & I’m continuing to monitor what additional action is needed to help Georgia. More info: https://t.co/j43xRM03Gg

Our hospitals & farmers have been on the front lines of the COVID-19 pandemic keeping all of us cared for and fed. Thanks @stevenmnuchin1 and @SBAJovita for your quick work to ensure Georgia non-profit hospitals and farmers can apply for #PPP loans. https://t.co/1UG4DOA47c

As we wrap up #NationalPoliceWeek I want to thank all law enforcement - local state and federal - for selflessly protecting their fellow American every day.   This week every week and especially during #COVID19 we honor our law enforcement. God bless you all! https://t.co/Ro1uvkg1Ul

I’ve created the USA RISE Plan as a framework for economic revival that focuses on 4 pillars: made in the USA grown in the USA hiring in the USA & supporting families in the USA.   I know we will rise above #COVID19 & return to the success America experienced just months ago. https://t.co/0jspslpku8

From @mHealthIntel on our new bill asking the VA to expand telehealth access: “With their bill Loeffler and @SenatorSinema put the emphasis on hardships caused by COVID-19.”   Read more here: https://t.co/oLGHNgfgAi

I asked the admin’s Chief Ag Negotiator Gregg Doud to reschedule a USTR field hearing in GA cancelled due to #COVID19 that was to focus on how foreign trade policy negatively impacts our farmers.   I am committed to ensuring a level playing field for our farmers.

Even before #COVID19 Georgia’s farmers were facing low commodity prices trade challenges farm labor shortages & delayed Hurricane Michael relief. I am hard at work championing our farmers who put their businesses on the line every day to feed America. https://t.co/UaSjl4TqyS
China must answer for its deliberate misinformation campaign and utter mishandling of COVID-19.  That’s why at today’s HELP hearing I asked @CDCgov about it. https://t.co/VnuB07x1Ob

Honored to host a conference call for GA hospitals & nursing homes with @CMSGov @SeemaCMS. We discussed the concerns of health care & long term care facilities in their battle against #COVID19 & how the federal government is working to support them.

China must pay the price for its role in COVID-19 which has cost American lives wrecked our economy pushed our health care system to the brink & devastated families & communities.   @realDonaldTrump must hold China accountable. I'm confident he will.  https://t.co/NdC0W0TbJJ

MAJOR news in our fight against the invisible enemy. With the FDA's approval of the first at-home diagnostic test for #COVIDー19 American ingenuity is once again helping us combat the spread of the virus which is critical to reopening America.  https://t.co/gBIambDduH

GA-based @UPS is donating $15M to help address food security health care education & financial sustainability amid #COVID19. This money will also maintain nonprofits during & after recovery.   Thanks @UPS for helping communities as we navigate through & recover from COVID-19.
Thank you @emoryuniversity for your dedication and tireless work to develop a vaccine for #COVIDー19. https://t.co/r2ppEkbHlb

Many heroes of #COVIDー19 are those we may have taken for granted previously - truck drivers store clerks public transit operators. We owe a deep sense of gratitude to our everyday essential workers.   More on how GA essential workers are helping our state remain operational: https://t.co/0ggsALf62p

Across the country #NationalVolunteerWeek strikes a different chord than years before.   We have never needed volunteerism more than we do today and we thank our volunteers for their selfless service to their fellow Americans in this battle against #COVID19.

Couldn’t agree more @ChuckRobbins!   Thank you @Cisco for your generous donation of this desperately needed PPE N-95 masks. This welcomed contribution will make a tangible difference in Georgia’s fight against #COVID19 https://t.co/RB0S6wl7s1

As I heard on my call with @GAFoodBankAssn & other GA food banks families are relying on local food banks more than ever because of #COVID19.   We discussed the need for deregulation so food banks across GA can meet increased demand. I'm working to make sure that happens.

Thank you @realDonaldTrump for appointing me to your task force on re-opening America safely in the wake of #COVID19.  With 22 million Americans filing for unemployment it’s clear we must start working to revive our economy and get the American people back to work safely.

As a steadfast defender of life I will not sit back & allow basic human rights of the unborn to be violated under the guise of #COVID19 research.   I joined my colleagues in urging @POTUS to maintain pro-life protections amid the search for COVID-19 treatments & cures. More: https://t.co/XHbQwMiViK

Proud to join this effort. We must work to combat the suppression of free speech & flow of info during this pandemic.  Make no mistake - we are in this war-like situation because of China’s failure to act on #COVID19 swiftly & honestly.   We cannot allow this to happen again. https://t.co/3RqkMSpnuz

The Georgians who own small businesses need all the help they can get during the COVID-19 outbreak. I answered questions from GA @NFIB members today about how to apply for #PPP loans so we can keep workers employed and our economy afloat.

Spoke with the Statesboro-Bulloch Chamber this morning about the work I’m doing to get more funding for #smallbiz PPP loans initially included in the #CARESAct.  I remain laser-focused on getting relief  to Georgia businesses & ensuring workers receive paychecks during #COVID19.

As we celebrate #WorldHealthDay join me in thanking the thousands of health care warriors who are on the forefront of the battle against #coronavirus.   Each of you make us proud and inspire the world every day.   We as a nation stand with you and are grateful for you. https://t.co/tji1NOCpnU

Through public-private partnerships we can leverage the world-class innovation of American businesses against the #coronavirus.    Thank you @CVSHealth for putting its resources to use by opening a drive-through #COVID19 testing center in Georgia. https://t.co/63vtv3OYnL

Right now our nurses need all the help they can get from wherever they can get it.   I made this clear when asking @StateDept @USDOL @DHSgov to prioritize processing visas for nurses coming to America to fight #COVID19 alongside our American nurses. https://t.co/CAACEqRJub

For Georgians who have lost their job because of the #COVIDー19 outbreak visit https://t.co/0q88CXWxcj to learn how you can take advantage of the relief Congress recently passed. https://t.co/aWlnDFdf5b

ATTN GA Veterans: the #VA has implemented an aggressive public health response to protect and care for our heroes in the wake of #COVID19. We're working directly with state and federal partners to fight this virus and provide relief to the men and women who served America. https://t.co/HPWsSi4WzU

Outstanding work by @GovKemp @GeorgiaEMA and @BORUSG to secure temporary housing for nurses traveling to Georgia to help care for #COVID19 patients at Phoebe Putney Memorial Hospital in Albany one of the worst hit areas in Georgia. Thank you to these incredible nurses! https://t.co/SHqUP73Rjz

China’s stats on #COVIDー19 are based on misinformation. It’s clearer than ever the Chinese Communist Party is concealing the numbers and data behind the nature of the #coronavirus.   How many more deaths will occur because of China’s deception? https://t.co/gbTkKBcsLN
